rename.from: Kubernetes extension crashes when NPE during build
rename.to: Kubernetes extension crashes with NPE during build

body: FYI I do have many remotes defined, and one of them is `origin`.

Thanks for reporting!

Sounds like an easy fix, but it would be in Dekorate, not Quarkus itself
Yes I imagined. That said, on the Quarkus side, we might want to test if `scm.getRemote().get("origin")` is null... not everyone has a remote called `origin` ;-)
That sounds like a very specific workaround ðŸ˜€
